author: 693660c30da4f2be29a3a5ce
commentText: Initial contact made. Lead seems interested and asked for more info.

author: 693660c30da4f2be29a3a5cf
commentText: Sent follow-up email. Waiting for response.

author: 693660c30da4f2be29a3a5d0
commentText: Lead requested a product demo scheduled for next week.

author: 693660c30da4f2be29a3a5d1
commentText: Demo completed. Lead showed strong interest.

author: 693660c30da4f2be29a3a5d2
commentText: Pricing details sent. Awaiting final approval.

author: 693660c30da4f2be29a3a5ce
commentText: Lead needs more time. Follow-up scheduled for next Monday.

author: 693660c30da4f2be29a3a5cf
commentText: Cold call attempt unsuccessful. Will retry later.

author: 693660c30da4f2be29a3a5d0
commentText: Lead asked for discount options. Reviewing eligibility.

author: 693660c30da4f2be29a3a5d1
commentText: Proposal sent. Lead is evaluating and will respond soon.

author: 693660c30da4f2be29a3a5d2
commentText: Lead confirmed they are ready to move forward.
